des: "This is a delicious creamy corn and walnut dip that goes great with wheat crackers or tortilla chips. Its addicting combination of flavors makes it a winner at any party. It's always gone in the blink of an eye."
ins: With a mixer, blend together cream cheese, oil, lime juice, red chile pepper, cumin, and salt until smooth. Stir in corn, walnuts, and onion. Cover, and refrigerate.
